alert.note: Alert for Kent (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 4:07AM EST until January 06 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches. * WHERE...Kent county. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow showers should increase in coverage and intensity later this morning and last into the afternoon before moving south of the county this evening. Snowfall rates may reach a half inch to one inch per hour within the heaviest snow showers. Areas with the greatest impacts to travel will likely be across southern and western portions of the county where hazardous travel may persist.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
